Rules.InvariantScript: If('Channel Subscriptions Screen'.Width < 'Channel Subscriptions Screen'.Height, Layout.Vertical, Layout.Horizontal)
Filter('Notification Subscriptions', 'Owning User'.'Primary Email' = UserEmail, 'Search Input'.Text in 'Notification Channel'.Name)
Parent.Height-'Channel Subscriptions Gallery'.Y-'Channel Sub Buttons Container'.Height
